section.title: Howto iChat through firewalls
section.p: While Mac's iChat (from 10.8 onwards iMessage) group text chats work from inside certain fire walls, audio and video group chats don't always work. To make them work, their trafic has to go through a proxy. This document describes how to set this up on Mac OS X, using SquidMan.

ol.li: Install SquidMan by dropping it into the Applications folder
Start SquidMan, and press Start in SquidMan window
Disconnect all active connections in iChat
Press the Accounts button, then your AIM/.Mac account name, then Server properties.
Activate http in the protocol field
Try connecting to the iChat server again, by setting your status to Available
